about_the_game:
■ Stylized action combat ■


Dodge and teleport out of harm's way with high mobility skills. Strategize with on the fly character switching. Move between ranged attacks and AoE magic as an archer or close-range melee combat and flashy quick fire abilities as a battlemage. Customize each character even further with a tech tree and the ability to make your own custom combos!

■ A diverse hand-painted world ■


Lush forests, dank sewers, and the blizzard torn peaks are just a small fraction of the diverse biomes, cultures and locals to discover on your journey. Step inside cozy inns, tea shops, and a variety of stores and houses illuminated by our custom 2d lighting system. You can enter almost all interiors scattered across the world.

■ Mini games and hidden items ■


Become a sandwich artist, race raptors to the finish, or seek out the world’s greatest treasures! With mini games and hidden items sprinkled throughout the world, there is always something new to discover.

■ Like a good book... Follow Rin, a Princess devoted to her nation; and Eldric, a humble blacksmith's apprentice with a mysterious past as they embark on a journey that bridges time, space, and worlds unknown. Dive deep into the themes of the human condition and the perceived power of gods. Drawing heavily from fantasy and sci-fi elements while exploring a new take on the classic JRPG tropes typically found in the genre. Play the game as you see fit with a fully voiced cast or text only for that classic experience.

■ The melodies of nostalgia... With over 50 hand crafted tracks, our composer Thomas Sequoia Kratochvil set out to take you on an audible journey through the world inspired by the rich history of RPG soundtracks.

short_description: Confront fate and the gods themselves in Echoes of the Stars, a 2D Handpainted Action RPG. Explore diverse biomes, gain new skills, fight challenging foes, unlock new abilities, play mini-games, and unfold the epic journey of Eldric and Rin.

English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, French, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
